title: Dating website or app usage among U.S. online users 2019
summary: This statistic shows the hypothetical app usage Yes_I'm_doing_so_currently a website on U.S. membership in U.S. Yes_I'm_doing_so_currently ( online ) as of October 2019 .
During the survey , 24 % of respondents stated that they had attained a Yes_I've_done_so_in_the_past .

data.Response: Yes I've done so in the past
